author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: Anyone who can do the splits and come back up on the backbeat, as James Brown and Prince can, has my eternal respect. Prince, who is a genius of the highest order, can come back up while singing and playing the guitar.
author: Bill Nighy

text: I have a strong emotional respect for Steve.
author: Walter Isaacson

text: The working class owes all honor and respect to the first men who planted the standard of labor solidarity on the hostile frontier of unorganized industry.
author: Ralph Chaplin

text: Never respect men merely for their riches, but rather for their philanthropy we do not value the sun for its height, but for its use.
author: Gamaliel Bailey
